name: GenAI Toolbox
author: CamphorDev

sections.description:
Key Features:

Image-Driven Content: Need a caption or story? Simply select an image within your post and let our AI craft compelling narratives for you.
Text-Driven Enhancements: Highlight some text and access a world of AI functionalities – be it insightful feedback, targeted keywords, catchy titles, or engaging Twitter posts.

Your AI Editorial Team: Benefit from real-time AI suggestions as you type, ensuring your content is optimized and engaging.

Explore and Discover: Not just a toolbox, but a playground. Dive deep into our features, experiment, and discover new ways to elevate your content.

Empowering Your Voice:
With GenAI, we imagine a future where AI not only automates but also inspires.. Our vision is to enhance individual creativity, amplify voices, and transform content creation into a delightful journey for all.

Simple, Yet Powerful:
Intuitive by design, GenAI Toolbox is built for both beginners and seasoned WordPress users. Coupled with a user-friendly interface, our seamless integration will ensure that you get the most out of our AI capabilities with minimal effort.

Disclaimer:
While the GenAI Toolbox is geared towards maximizing productivity in content creation, users should also take into account the suitability and relevance of said content. We recommend reviewing and fine-tuning AI-generated content to ensure that it aligns with your brand and resonates with your audience.

Third-Party Service Integration:
Our plugin integrates with a third-party service to generate automated content such as image-driven creations and text-driven enhancements based on human inputs. The service is provided by CamphorAI (https://camphor.ai), which aims to maximize your productivity and creativity.
The service URL is https://camphor.ai/service/caption/.
The terms of use is at: and https://camphor.ai/term.
The privacy policy is at: https://camphor.ai/privacy.

Getting Started:

Install the GenAI Toolbox plugin.
Dive into our features – select images or input text to begin.
Let your creativity flourish with an AI twist!
Supported Languages: English.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin by clicking the “Install Now” button.
  2. Click the “Activate” button to enable the plugin.
  3. Register an account in the “GenAI Toolbox Settings” and login.
sections.faq:
Do I need to register an account to use this toolbox?

Yes, please register an account with us to use this toolbox.

Do I need to select some text or images to be able to use the toolbox?

Yes, that’s correct. GenAI Toolbox’s features assist you in your content creation process by working in collaboration with your text inputs and/or images.

Can I select multiple images or multiple paragraphs of text at a time?

Yes, both are supported.

I’ve noticed that only 100 credits are allocated. Can I have more credits to use these features?

Yes, we are working on it. Stay tuned.

screenshots.caption: Select one or more images and click the GenAI Toolbox icon to generate captions and/or stories
Select one or more paragraphs and click the GenAI Toolbox icon to generate keywords, titles, Refine (feedback), and Twitter posts.
